body_html: I think I figured out the cause of error. I'd CUDA 8.0/cuDNN 6.1 installed which expected VS2015 toolchain. After I uninstalled those and installed CUDA 9.2/cuDNN 7.1, I'm now past above error. I would suggest to add this in docs for WIndows build section because instructions there mentions VS2017 which would only work for CUDA 9.x/cuDNN7.x.

body: I think I figured out the cause of error. I'd CUDA 8.0/cuDNN 6.1 installed which expected VS2015 toolchain. After I uninstalled those and installed CUDA 9.2/cuDNN 7.1, I'm now past above error. I would suggest to add this in docs for WIndows build section because instructions there mentions VS2017 which would only work for CUDA 9.x/cuDNN7.x.
